description: Program "Bulgarian Libraries - Access Points to Information and Communication for All"

subproject.corporate outcome: Access to information policies support accountability and transparency
subproject.description: The strategic goal of the project is to provide easy and equitable access to information, knowledge, communications and electronic services in public libraries via free use of the Internet and other information and communication technologies, so as to enable Bulgarian citizens integrate into the global information society.
subproject.title: Global Libraries - Bulgaria
